page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart u style text method

argument.name: drawSettings
argument.description: The draw settings for the text to style.

property.name: color
property.description: The color of the text. A value of "default" will result in the default palette color being used. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the color.

property.name: outline
property.description: If true or an object is passed in then an outline will be added to the text style. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the outline.

property.name: color
property.description: The CSS color to use for the text outline. If not supplied then the palette default will be used.

property.name: width
property.description: The number of pixels of solid outline to have around the text. If not supplied then the palette default will be used.

property.name: halo
property.description: The number of pixels of halo falloff to have around the outline of the text. If not supplied then the palette default will be used.

property.name: style
property.description: The CSS style to add to the text. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the style.

argument.name: data
argument.description: The chart data. See *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*.

argument.name: path
argument.description: An optional name to store the result in if the result is going to be used repeatedly.

page.description: Get style for a chart text element.
